location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has slightly obscured the address and signature of the letter. However, both of these can still be clearly read.

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of instructions that ordered the Resident to apply to the Persian Government for indemnification for property lost at Nakhiloo, or seek permission for the Bombay Government to pursue the family of the late Shiek Rahmah for the same.
